block.p: SCHULMAN-Max. Of Sarasota, FL, on September 22. Beloved husband of the late Celia. Devoted father of Suzanne and Dr. Oscar Hausdorff. Loving grandfather of Karen and Rabbi Steven, Gail and Mark, Lisa and Pinny, and Fanny and Dov. Dear great-grandfather of fifteen. Services will be held at Cedar Park Cemetery, Emerson, NJ, on Monday, September 25. For information call ''Wien & Wien,'' 1-800-322-0533.
